item.description:
Join us for a fabulous night of shopping and fun at Pandora. Check out Pandora's latest jewelry and enjoy complimentary wine, desserts and delicious pizza from Wicked Pizza. Enter a drawing for a Pandora prize and break out your awesome summer shoes to show off during the pink carpet walk-off. Sephora, Chocolate Therapy and Pandora will be providing prizes for the ladies with the best shoes!

Every guest takes home a gift bag including items from Pandora, Chocolate Therapy and Sephora. Space is limited, so sign up soon!

10% of the event's sales at Pandora will be donated to Project Smile, the non profit organization helping children in traumatic events.

Pandora offers women across the world a collection of high quality, hand finished jewelry products at affordable prices, thereby inspiring women to express their individuality.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside the venue or call 774 232 0000! I am hosting the event!
item.name: Ladies Night at Pandora Legacy Place: Comp Wine, Apps, Gift Bags and Shopping!
